marklogic.body:
The "wackos" on the Christian-right most definitely DO NOT represent 75% of the American public. At best, they make up barely 19% - a well connected and dominant part of the Republican Party, yes, but in a general election their influences diminishes dramatically.
Nevertheless, the American, political elite treat Israel's every move as though it's been ordained by the gods. The American political elite's acceptance of Israel's multiple war crimes and general military aggression against its neighbors is an international disgrace and a crime in itself.
In answer to your question: "Just who is going to stop them?" The Israeli elite, that's who.
History teaches us that when one group, nation, state, religion, etc., enough power differential over their neighbors, enemies, competitors, or whatever, to allow them to independently and aggressively against their adversaries, at their whim, they inevitably first turn all other peoples into their enemies and then waste themselves in useless, endless, pointless, destructive actions against those "enemies," until they've exhausted their resources and collapsed their own societies.
Israel's political and military leaders are Israel's worst enemies and will ultimately destroy Israel (it's much the same with America since the end of the Cold War).
The elites Always destroy their own societies, usually with a combination of maniacal greed and a lust for the profits of war.
